meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by hemiplegia.
meanings.sent1: The hemiplegic patient had weakness on one side of their body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the hemiplegic symptoms to the concerned family.
meanings.sent3: The hemiplegic cat could only use one of its paws to play with the toy.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was hemiplegic, as she struggled to express herself through art.
meanings.sent5: The hemiplegic tree leaned to one side, unable to stand tall like the others.

meanings.sent1: The hemiplegic received physical therapy to improve their mobility.
meanings.sent2: The hemiplegic was determined to regain strength in their paralyzed arm.
meanings.sent3: The hemiplegic at the party impressed everyone with their positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a hemiplegic in the world of dance, unable to move with grace.
meanings.sent5: The hemiplegic's smile lit up the room, despite their physical challenges.
